Class Triangle

java.lang.Object
  Drawable
      Triangle

public class Triangle
extends Drawable

A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.

Version:
2008.03.30
Author:
Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes

Constructor Detail

Triangle

public Triangle()
Create a new triangle at default position with default color. New Triangle objects are green and positioned with their tip at (250,250) with a height of 40 and a width of 50.

Triangle

public Triangle(int height,
                int width)
Create a new triangle of a given height and width at default position with default color. New Triangles are green and positioned with their tip at (250,250).

Parameters:
height - the height of the triangle.
width - the width of the base of the triangle
Method Detail

changeSize

public void changeSize(int newHeight,
                       int newWidth)
Change the height and width to the new size (in pixels).

Parameters:
newHeight - the new hight of the triangle.
newWidth - the new width of the triangle.
